about_the_game:
Rest in Peace is a rogue-like adventure game, possessing an exciting journey in a weird countryside setting against legends of Chinese folklore, imbibes huge amounts of anecdotes and old saws.

Players in Rest in Peace, watchmen from the nether world, have taken ‘exorcising devils’ as their core mission. You are free to choose combinations of spell-like skills, to decide the path of enhancements for skills on your own.

-Bizarre World: Between Yin and Yang

Rest in Peace is a rogue-like adventure game set in a ghast countryside filled with evil spirits and demons, located in a bizarre region on the fringes of the human and ghostly realms.

-Adventure: Weird and Fascinating

Players, as watchmen from the nether world, will exorcise the demons hiding in a ghast countryside surrounded by dark dank scrubs and trees.

Some of those watchmen have familiar faces and were well-known within the thousands-of-year folk culture of China. Some are strange but still vivid characters, unique in Rest in Peace, created by our talented fellows according to outlandish tales based on their own experiences.

Also, the demons in Rest in Peace, which players will take themselves as encounters, are evil spirits and weird monsters often seen in folklore spread widely in our culture. Those demons have tortuous and fantastic backstorys, providing players endless fancy and imagination.

Besides the core mission: exorcising the demons, huge amounts of temporary missions awaited in Rest in Peace. In those extra missions, players will see more annoying spirits and monsters. We hope those missions can provide players with exciting feelings in adventures as much as possible.

-Battle: A fancy match of gameplay, replay value, and pleasure

Players will get rewards by defeating evil spirits and monsters in Rest in Peace. Those rewards can enhance the power of their avatars in different ways.

By picking up some of those rewards, players’ avatars can learn various spell-like skills; Meanwhile, combine those skills to create the strongest packages of skills for follow-up battles.

Players can adjust their skill packages at any time: changing choices of skills, selecting the appropriate combination of skills, decide the direction of enhancement of skills, which will make every second of battles a brand-new experience.

-Promising future: constantly and gradually updating

Game designers are committed to providing players with fresh, timely, interesting gameplay content. We are willing to give a satisfactory answer to players who like and support the whole mechanics of game design.

We are eager to hear feedback from passionate players. Your valuable ideas can help us to optimize the quality of Rest in Peace.
